queries.created_At: SELECT updated_at, created_at FROM  web_hoo WHERE id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM web_hoo)
queries.count_sql_orders: SELECT order_name FROM web_hoo WHERE DATE(CREATED_AT ) > (CURDATE()-2) AND order_name IS NOT NULL AND order_posted<>1
queries.services_table: SELECT * FROM servicedata WHERE STATUS = 'in-progress' AND Skip_Count > 0
queries.rps_time: select max(doc.post_date) as postdate from rps.document doc where doc.sbs_no =1 and doc.order_type = 0 and doc.pos_flag1 is not null and doc.so_cancel_flag = 0 and doc.status = 4 and doc.notes_general is not null
queries.courier_assigned_time: select max(modified_datetime) AS MODIFIED_DATETIME from order_status_c where status = '305'
queries.unverified_orders_count: select count(*) from rps.document a ,order_status_C b where a.udf4_string = 0 and a.so_cancel_flag = 0 and a.doc_no is null and a.sbs_no=1 and a.order_doc_no is not null and A.SID= B.ORDER_RETAIL_ID and B.STATUS = 300
queries.doBE: SELECT count(note) FROM so i WHERE (note) IN (SELECT note FROM so where active=1 and to_char(created_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY')>to_char('06/19/2021') GROUP BY note HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) and held<>1 and cust_po_no not in ('BAF','2CO','DHL') and cancel_date is null and active=1 and to_char(created_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY')>to_char('06/19/2021') ORDER BY note
queries.short_inventory_orders: select count(*) as data from custom_order_pickeR_doc where short_inventory=1
queries.oc_qty: select sum(available_qty) as omni_available_qt from invn_qty_c I, inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null
queries.shopify_qty: select sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available from inventory_c i,invn_sbs ii where i.item_sid=ii.item_sid and I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null AND Ii.ECI_FLAG = 1
queries.qty_table: select i.upc as upc, i.sku as sku, I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY as shopify_available_qty, C.AVAILABLE_QTY as available_qty from inventory_c i, invn_qty_c c where I.ITEM_SID = C.ITEM_SID and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY > C.AVAILABLE_QTY and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY <> 0 and s_product_id is not null
queries.order_status: select notes_general,created_datetime,so_cancel_flag from rps.document where notes_general not in (select shopify_order_no from order_status_c) and status = 4 and order_doc_no is not null and so_cancel_flag = 0
queries.oc_shopify_diffrence: SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify),SUM(omni),SUM(DIFF) FROM (SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify_available)shopify,SUM(available_qty)omni,SUM(shopify_available-available_qty)DIFF FROM (select I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,  sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available,0 AS available_qty, II.MODIFIED_DATE AS V9_DATE,NULL AS OMNI_DATE  from inventory_c i,INVN_SBS II where I.ITEM_SID=II.ITEM_SID AND  I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null GROUP BY I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,II.MODIFIED_DATE UNION ALL select IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,0 AS shopify_available, sum(available_qty) as available_qty, NULL AS V9_DATE,I.MODIFIED_DATE AS OMNI_DATE from invn_qty_c I , inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null GROUP BY IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,I.MODIFIED_DATE) GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID) WHERE DIFF <>0 GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID
queries.last_3_hours_sale: select  case when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=00 then '12:00 AM to 01:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=01 then '01:00 AM to 02:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=02 then '02:00 AM to 03:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=03 then '03:00 AM to 04:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=04 then '04:00 AM to 05:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=05 then '05:00 AM to 06:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=06 then '06:00 AM to 07:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=07 then '07:00 AM to 08:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=08 then '08:00 AM to 09:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=09 then '09:00 AM to 10:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=10 then '10:00 AM to 11:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=11 then '11:00 AM to 12:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=12 then '12:00 PM to 01:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=13 then '01:00 PM to 02:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=14 then '02:00 PM to 03:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=15 then '03:00 PM to 04:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=16 then '04:00 PM to 05:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=17 then '05:00 PM to 06:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=18 then '06:00 PM to 07:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=19 then '07:00 PM to 08:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=20 then '08:00 PM to 09:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=21 then '08:00 PM to 10:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=22 then '10:00 PM to 11:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=23 then '11:00 PM to 12:00 AM' end Time_slot ,  count(h.note) as so_order_count,   sum((d.ord_qty * d.price) * (1 - NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS so_NetSales  from so_V h, so_item d where h.so_sid=d.so_sid and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - (2 / 24) AND SYSDATE group by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24') order by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')
queries.last_3_hours_invoice: select case when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=00 then '12:00 AM to 01:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=01 then '01:00 AM to 02:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=02 then '02:00 AM to 03:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=03 then '03:00 AM to 04:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=04 then '04:00 AM to 05:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=05 then '05:00 AM to 06:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=06 then '06:00 AM to 07:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=07 then '07:00 AM to 08:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=08 then '08:00 AM to 09:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=09 then '09:00 AM to 10:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=10 then '10:00 AM to 11:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=11 then '11:00 AM to 12:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=12 then '12:00 PM to 01:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=13 then '01:00 PM to 02:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=14 then '02:00 PM to 03:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=15 then '03:00 PM to 04:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=16 then '04:00 PM to 05:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=17 then '05:00 PM to 06:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=18 then '06:00 PM to 07:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=19 then '07:00 PM to 08:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=20 then '08:00 PM to 09:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=21 then '08:00 PM to 10:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=22 then '10:00 PM to 11:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=23 then '11:00 PM to 12:00 AM' end Time_slot ,  count(h.note) as inv_order_count,   sum((d.qty * d.price * h.report_modifier) * (1 - NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS invc_NetSales  from invoice_v h, invc_item_v d where h.invc_sid=d.invc_sid and h.Held <>1 and h.invc_no > 0 AND h.invc_type IN (0,2) and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - (2 / 24) AND SYSDATE group by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24') order by 1
queries.inventory_sync: SELECT inv.item_sid,inv_qty.available_qty,inv.SHOPIFY_INVENTORY_ID,qty_flag,new_insert,inv.upc,inv.sku from inventory_c inv , invn_qty_c inv_qty where inv.tem_sid inv_qty.item_sid and inv.s_product_id is not null and (inv.qty_flag = 1 OR inv_qty.new_insert = 1) and upc in ('Item UPC')”;

queries.qty_table: select i.upc as upc, i.sku as sku, I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY as shopify_available_qty, C.AVAILABLE_QTY as available_qty from inventory_c i, invn_qty_c c where I.ITEM_SID = C.ITEM_SID and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY > C.AVAILABLE_QTY and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY <> 0 and s_product_id is not null
queries.oc_shopify_diffrence: SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify),SUM(omni),SUM(DIFF) FROM (SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify_available)shopify,SUM(available_qty)omni,SUM(shopify_available-available_qty)DIFF FROM (select I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,  sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available,0 AS available_qty, II.MODIFIED_DATE AS V9_DATE,NULL AS OMNI_DATE  from inventory_c i,INVN_SBS II where I.ITEM_SID=II.ITEM_SID AND  I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null GROUP BY I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,II.MODIFIED_DATE UNION ALL select IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,0 AS shopify_available, sum(available_qty) as available_qty, NULL AS V9_DATE,I.MODIFIED_DATE AS OMNI_DATE from invn_qty_c I , inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null GROUP BY IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,I.MODIFIED_DATE) GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID) WHERE DIFF <>0 GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID
queries.last_3_hours_sale: select  case when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=00 then '12:00 AM to 01:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=01 then '01:00 AM to 02:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=02 then '02:00 AM to 03:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=03 then '03:00 AM to 04:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=04 then '04:00 AM to 05:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=05 then '05:00 AM to 06:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=06 then '06:00 AM to 07:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=07 then '07:00 AM to 08:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=08 then '08:00 AM to 09:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=09 then '09:00 AM to 10:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=10 then '10:00 AM to 11:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=11 then '11:00 AM to 12:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=12 then '12:00 PM to 01:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=13 then '01:00 PM to 02:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=14 then '02:00 PM to 03:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=15 then '03:00 PM to 04:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=16 then '04:00 PM to 05:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=17 then '05:00 PM to 06:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=18 then '06:00 PM to 07:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=19 then '07:00 PM to 08:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=20 then '08:00 PM to 09:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=21 then '08:00 PM to 10:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=22 then '10:00 PM to 11:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=23 then '11:00 PM to 12:00 AM' end Time_slot ,  count(h.note) as so_order_count,   sum((d.ord_qty * d.price) * (1 - NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS so_NetSales  from so_V h, so_item d where h.so_sid=d.so_sid and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - (2 / 24) AND SYSDATE group by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24') order by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')
queries.last_3_hours_invoice: select case when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=00 then '12:00 AM to 01:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=01 then '01:00 AM to 02:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=02 then '02:00 AM to 03:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=03 then '03:00 AM to 04:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=04 then '04:00 AM to 05:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=05 then '05:00 AM to 06:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=06 then '06:00 AM to 07:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=07 then '07:00 AM to 08:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=08 then '08:00 AM to 09:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=09 then '09:00 AM to 10:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=10 then '10:00 AM to 11:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=11 then '11:00 AM to 12:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=12 then '12:00 PM to 01:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=13 then '01:00 PM to 02:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=14 then '02:00 PM to 03:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=15 then '03:00 PM to 04:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=16 then '04:00 PM to 05:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=17 then '05:00 PM to 06:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=18 then '06:00 PM to 07:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=19 then '07:00 PM to 08:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=20 then '08:00 PM to 09:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=21 then '08:00 PM to 10:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=22 then '10:00 PM to 11:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=23 then '11:00 PM to 12:00 AM' end Time_slot ,  count(h.note) as inv_order_count,   sum((d.qty * d.price * h.report_modifier) * (1 - NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS invc_NetSales  from invoice_v h, invc_item_v d where h.invc_sid=d.invc_sid and h.Held <>1 and h.invc_no > 0 AND h.invc_type IN (0,2) and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - (2 / 24) AND SYSDATE group by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24') order by 1
queries.price_sync: Select item_Sid,sum(pl1) as PL_1,sum(pl2) as PL_2 from (select i.local_upc,to_char(ip.item_Sid) as item_sid,ROUND(ip.PRICE,0) as PL1, 0 as PL2, PC.PL_1 as cpl_1 ,0 as pl_2 ,(ip.price-PC.PL_1)as dcpl_1,0 as dcpl_2 from invn_sbs_price ip,invn_sbs i ,invn_price_c pc where i.item_sid = ip.item_sid and  ip.sbs_no = 2 and ip.price_lvl=1 and i.eci_flag 1 and  PC.ITEM_SID=I.ITEM_SID and ROUND(ip.PRICE,0)-PC.PL_1 <>0 union all select i.local_upc,to_char(ip.item_Sid) as item_sid,0 as PL1, ROUND(ip.PRICE,0) as PL2 ,0 as cpl_1 ,PC.PL_2 as cpl_2 ,0 as dcpl_1,(ip.price-PC.PL_2) as dcpl_2 from invn_sbs_price ip,invn_sbs i,invn_price_c pc where i.item_sid = ip.item_sid and  ip.sbs_no = 2 and ip.price_lvl=5 and i.eci_flag = 1 and  PC.ITEM_SID=I.ITEM_SID and ROUND(ip.PRICE,0)-(PC.PL_2) <> 0 and IP.SEASON_ID=0 ) t1 where local_upc in ('2000000172917) group by item_sid,local_upc
queries.inventory_sync: SELECT inv.item_sid,inv_qty.available_qty,inv.SHOPIFY_INVENTORY_ID,qty_flag,new_insert,inv.upc,inv.sku from inventory_c inv , invn_qty_c inv_qty where inv.tem_sid inv_qty.item_sid and inv.s_product_id is not null and (inv.qty_flag = 1 OR inv_qty.new_insert = 1) and upc in ('Item UPC')”;

queries.created_At: SELECT updated_at, created_at FROM  web_hoo WHERE id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM web_hoo)
queries.count_sql_orders: SELECT order_name FROM web_hoo WHERE DATE(CREATED_AT ) > (CURDATE()-2) AND order_name IS NOT NULL AND order_posted<>1
queries.services_table: SELECT * FROM servicedata WHERE STATUS = 'in-progress' AND Skip_Count > 0
queries.rps_time: select max(doc.post_date) as postdate from rps.document doc where doc.sbs_no =2 and doc.order_type = 0 and doc.pos_flag1 is not null and doc.so_cancel_flag = 0 and doc.status = 4 and doc.notes_general is not null
queries.courier_assigned_time: select max(modified_datetime) AS MODIFIED_DATETIME from order_status_c where status = '305'
queries.unverified_orders_count: select count(*) from rps.document a ,order_status_C b where a.udf4_string = 0 and a.so_cancel_flag = 0 and a.doc_no is null and a.sbs_no=2 and a.order_doc_no is not null and A.SID= B.ORDER_RETAIL_ID and B.STATUS = 300
queries.doBE: SELECT count(note) FROM so i WHERE (note) IN (SELECT note FROM so where active=1 and to_char(created_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY')>to_char('06/19/2021') GROUP BY note HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) and held<>1 and cust_po_no not in ('BAF','2CO','DHL') and cancel_date is null and active=1 and to_char(created_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY')>to_char('06/19/2021') ORDER BY note
queries.short_inventory_orders: select count(*) as data from custom_order_pickeR_doc where short_inventory=1
queries.oc_qty: select sum(available_qty) as omni_available_qt from invn_qty_c I, inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null
queries.shopify_qty: select sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available from inventory_c i,invn_sbs ii,invn_udf_v ud where i.item_sid=ii.item_sid and I.ITEM_SID=UD.ITEM_SID and Ii.ITEM_SID=UD.ITEM_SID and I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null AND Ii.ECI_FLAG = 1 and UDF_14  in ('MORBAGH')
queries.qty_table: select i.upc as upc, i.sku as sku, I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY as shopify_available_qty, C.AVAILABLE_QTY as available_qty from inventory_c i, invn_qty_c c where I.ITEM_SID = C.ITEM_SID and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY > C.AVAILABLE_QTY and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY <> 0 and s_product_id is not null
queries.oc_shopify_diffrence: SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify),SUM(omni),SUM(DIFF) FROM (SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify_available)shopify,SUM(available_qty)omni,SUM(shopify_available-available_qty)DIFF FROM (select I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,  sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available,0 AS available_qty, II.MODIFIED_DATE AS V9_DATE,NULL AS OMNI_DATE  from inventory_c i,INVN_SBS II where I.ITEM_SID=II.ITEM_SID AND  I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null GROUP BY I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,II.MODIFIED_DATE UNION ALL select IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,0 AS shopify_available, sum(available_qty) as available_qty, NULL AS V9_DATE,I.MODIFIED_DATE AS OMNI_DATE from invn_qty_c I , inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null GROUP BY IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,I.MODIFIED_DATE) GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID) WHERE DIFF <>0 GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID

NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS invc_NetSales  from invoice_v h, invc_item_v d where h.invc_sid=d.invc_sid and h.Held <>1 and h.invc_no > 0 AND h.invc_type IN (0,2) and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - queries.price_sync: Select item_Sid,sum(pl1) as PL_1,sum(pl2) as PL_2 from (select i.local_upc,to_char(ip.item_Sid) as item_sid,ROUND(ip.PRICE,0) as PL1, 0 as PL2, PC.PL_1 as cpl_1 ,0 as pl_2 ,(ip.price-PC.PL_1)as dcpl_1,0 as dcpl_2 from invn_sbs_price ip,invn_sbs i ,invn_price_c pc where i.item_sid = ip.item_sid and  ip.sbs_no = 2 and ip.price_lvl=1 and i.eci_flag 1 and  PC.ITEM_SID=I.ITEM_SID and ROUND(ip.PRICE,0)-PC.PL_1 <>0 union all select i.local_upc,to_char(ip.item_Sid) as item_sid,0 as PL1, ROUND(ip.PRICE,0) as PL2 ,0 as cpl_1 ,PC.PL_2 as cpl_2 ,0 as dcpl_1,(ip.price-PC.PL_2) as dcpl_2 from invn_sbs_price ip,invn_sbs i,invn_price_c pc where i.item_sid = ip.item_sid and  ip.sbs_no = 2 and ip.price_lvl=5 and i.eci_flag = 1 and  PC.ITEM_SID=I.ITEM_SID and ROUND(ip.PRICE,0)-(PC.PL_2) <> 0 and IP.SEASON_ID=0 ) t1 where local_upc in ('2000000172917) group by item_sid,local_upc
queries.inventory_sync: SELECT inv.item_sid,inv_qty.available_qty,inv.SHOPIFY_INVENTORY_ID,qty_flag,new_insert,inv.upc,inv.sku from inventory_c inv , invn_qty_c inv_qty where inv.tem_sid inv_qty.item_sid and inv.s_product_id is not null and (inv.qty_flag = 1 OR inv_qty.new_insert = 1) and upc in ('Item UPC')”;

queries.created_At: SELECT updated_at, created_at FROM  web_hoo WHERE id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM web_hoo)
queries.count_sql_orders: SELECT order_name FROM web_hoo WHERE DATE(CREATED_AT ) > (CURDATE()-2) AND order_name IS NOT NULL AND order_posted<>1
queries.services_table: SELECT * FROM servicedata WHERE STATUS = 'in-progress' AND Skip_Count > 0
queries.rps_time: select max(doc.post_date) as postdate from rps.document doc where doc.sbs_no =2 and doc.order_type = 0 and doc.pos_flag1 is not null and doc.so_cancel_flag = 0 and doc.status = 4 and doc.notes_general is not null
queries.courier_assigned_time: select max(modified_datetime) AS MODIFIED_DATETIME from order_status_c where status = '305'
queries.unverified_orders_count: select count(*) from rps.document a ,order_status_C b where a.udf4_string = 0 and a.so_cancel_flag = 0 and a.doc_no is null and a.sbs_no=2 and a.order_doc_no is not null and A.SID= B.ORDER_RETAIL_ID and B.STATUS = 300
queries.doBE: SELECT count(note) FROM so i WHERE (note) IN (SELECT note FROM so where active=1 and to_char(created_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY')>to_char('06/19/2021') GROUP BY note HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) and held<>1 and cust_po_no not in ('BAF','2CO','DHL') and cancel_date is null and active=1 and to_char(created_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY')>to_char('06/19/2021') ORDER BY note
queries.short_inventory_orders: select count(*) as data from custom_order_pickeR_doc where short_inventory=1
queries.oc_qty: select sum(available_qty) as omni_available_qt from invn_qty_c I, inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null
queries.shopify_qty: select sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available from inventory_c i,invn_sbs ii,invn_udf_v ud where i.item_sid=ii.item_sid and I.ITEM_SID=UD.ITEM_SID and Ii.ITEM_SID=UD.ITEM_SID and I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null AND Ii.ECI_FLAG = 1 and UDF_14  in ('PEPPER LAND','LIL PEPPERS','CANDY','INFANT','EAST')
queries.qty_table: select i.upc as upc, i.sku as sku, I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY as shopify_available_qty, C.AVAILABLE_QTY as available_qty from inventory_c i, invn_qty_c c where I.ITEM_SID = C.ITEM_SID and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY > C.AVAILABLE_QTY and I.SHOPIFY_AVAILABLE_QTY <> 0 and s_product_id is not null
queries.oc_shopify_diffrence: SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify),SUM(omni),SUM(DIFF) FROM (SELECT UPC,ITEM_SID,SUM(shopify_available)shopify,SUM(available_qty)omni,SUM(shopify_available-available_qty)DIFF FROM (select I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,  sum(shopify_available_qty) as shopify_available,0 AS available_qty, II.MODIFIED_DATE AS V9_DATE,NULL AS OMNI_DATE  from inventory_c i,INVN_SBS II where I.ITEM_SID=II.ITEM_SID AND  I.S_PRODUCT_ID is not null GROUP BY I.UPC,I.ITEM_SID,II.MODIFIED_DATE UNION ALL select IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,0 AS shopify_available, sum(available_qty) as available_qty, NULL AS V9_DATE,I.MODIFIED_DATE AS OMNI_DATE from invn_qty_c I , inventory_c ic where ic.item_sid = i.item_sid and ic.s_product_id is not null GROUP BY IC.UPC,IC.ITEM_SID,I.MODIFIED_DATE) GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID) WHERE DIFF <>0 GROUP BY UPC,ITEM_SID
queries.last_3_hours_sale: select  case when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=00 then '12:00 AM to 01:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=01 then '01:00 AM to 02:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=02 then '02:00 AM to 03:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=03 then '03:00 AM to 04:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=04 then '04:00 AM to 05:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=05 then '05:00 AM to 06:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=06 then '06:00 AM to 07:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=07 then '07:00 AM to 08:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=08 then '08:00 AM to 09:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=09 then '09:00 AM to 10:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=10 then '10:00 AM to 11:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=11 then '11:00 AM to 12:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=12 then '12:00 PM to 01:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=13 then '01:00 PM to 02:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=14 then '02:00 PM to 03:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=15 then '03:00 PM to 04:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=16 then '04:00 PM to 05:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=17 then '05:00 PM to 06:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=18 then '06:00 PM to 07:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=19 then '07:00 PM to 08:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=20 then '08:00 PM to 09:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=21 then '08:00 PM to 10:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=22 then '10:00 PM to 11:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=23 then '11:00 PM to 12:00 AM' end Time_slot ,  count(h.note) as so_order_count,   sum((d.ord_qty * d.price) * (1 - NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS so_NetSales  from so_V h, so_item d where h.so_sid=d.so_sid and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - (2 / 24) AND SYSDATE group by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24') order by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')
queries.last_3_hours_invoice: select case when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=00 then '12:00 AM to 01:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=01 then '01:00 AM to 02:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=02 then '02:00 AM to 03:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=03 then '03:00 AM to 04:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=04 then '04:00 AM to 05:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=05 then '05:00 AM to 06:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=06 then '06:00 AM to 07:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=07 then '07:00 AM to 08:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=08 then '08:00 AM to 09:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=09 then '09:00 AM to 10:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=10 then '10:00 AM to 11:00 AM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=11 then '11:00 AM to 12:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=12 then '12:00 PM to 01:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=13 then '01:00 PM to 02:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=14 then '02:00 PM to 03:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=15 then '03:00 PM to 04:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=16 then '04:00 PM to 05:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=17 then '05:00 PM to 06:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=18 then '06:00 PM to 07:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=19 then '07:00 PM to 08:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=20 then '08:00 PM to 09:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=21 then '08:00 PM to 10:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=22 then '10:00 PM to 11:00 PM' when  To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24')=23 then '11:00 PM to 12:00 AM' end Time_slot ,  count(h.note) as inv_order_count,   sum((d.qty * d.price * h.report_modifier) * (1 - NVL (h.disc_perc, 0) / 100)) AS invc_NetSales  from invoice_v h, invc_item_v d where h.invc_sid=d.invc_sid and h.Held <>1 and h.invc_no > 0 AND h.invc_type IN (0,2) and (h.Created_Date)  BETWEEN SYSDATE - (2 / 24) AND SYSDATE group by To_char(h.Created_Date,'HH24') order by 1
queries.price_sync: Select item_Sid,sum(pl1) as PL_1,sum(pl2) as PL_2 from (select i.local_upc,to_char(ip.item_Sid) as item_sid,ROUND(ip.PRICE,0) as PL1, 0 as PL2, PC.PL_1 as cpl_1 ,0 as pl_2 ,(ip.price-PC.PL_1)as dcpl_1,0 as dcpl_2 from invn_sbs_price ip,invn_sbs i ,invn_price_c pc where i.item_sid = ip.item_sid and  ip.sbs_no = 2 and ip.price_lvl=1 and i.eci_flag 1 and  PC.ITEM_SID=I.ITEM_SID and ROUND(ip.PRICE,0)-PC.PL_1 <>0 union all select i.local_upc,to_char(ip.item_Sid) as item_sid,0 as PL1, ROUND(ip.PRICE,0) as PL2 ,0 as cpl_1 ,PC.PL_2 as cpl_2 ,0 as dcpl_1,(ip.price-PC.PL_2) as dcpl_2 from invn_sbs_price ip,invn_sbs i,invn_price_c pc where i.item_sid = ip.item_sid and  ip.sbs_no = 2 and ip.price_lvl=5 and i.eci_flag = 1 and  PC.ITEM_SID=I.ITEM_SID and ROUND(ip.PRICE,0)-(PC.PL_2) <> 0 and IP.SEASON_ID=0 ) t1 where local_upc in ('2000000172917) group by item_sid,local_upc
queries.inventory_sync: SELECT inv.item_sid,inv_qty.available_qty,inv.SHOPIFY_INVENTORY_ID,qty_flag,new_insert,inv.upc,inv.sku from inventory_c inv , invn_qty_c inv_qty where inv.tem_sid inv_qty.item_sid and inv.s_product_id is not null and (inv.qty_flag = 1 OR inv_qty.new_insert = 1) and upc in ('Item UPC')”;
